channel.title: 2 bugs: A framerate drop and a Crossbow HUD disruption
channel.description:
1. After the ambush at the end of Questionable Ethics, there were 2 soldiers left above the room, shooting at me from up there. I noticed that killing the one closer to the central desk (relatively speaking) consistently resulted in a catastrophic drop in framerate. I speculate that it might have something to do with his ragdoll dropping from such a high place. The only way I could reliably kill him and play afterwards was to kill him with the TAU and gib him. So it's not a crippling bug, but you might want to look into it.
2. Quick-saving while I have the crossbow equipped crashes most of the HUD. Invariably. The crosshairs, HUD ammo symbols (not the numbers) and the "Saved..." message disappear, and do not re-appear when I equip another weapon. To make them come back I have to re-load a saved game (not quick-load)
Apart from that the game is an absolute gem. I call it a game, not a mod. It is no longer a mod.
